people.name: Murye Morris
people.info: Grandfather of the Jonyari family, patriarch of the father side.

people.name: Rebecca Kiden
people.info: Grandmother of the Jonyari family, matriarch of the father side, wife of Murye Morris.

people.name: Diko Murye
people.info: Grandmother of the Jonyari family, matriarch of the father side, wife of Murye Morris.

generations.title: Second Generation (Children of Murye Morris and Rebecca Kiden)

people.name: Azaria Wolyan
people.info: Firstborn son of Murye Morris and Rebecca Kiden.

people.name: Soso Chaplain
people.info: Son of Murye Morris and Rebecca Kiden.

people.name: Simon Wolyan
people.info: Son of Murye Morris and Rebecca Kiden.

people.name: Cecilia Yine
people.info: Daughter of Murye Morris and Rebecca Kiden.

people.name: Joseph Loguli
people.info: Son of Murye Morris and Rebecca Kiden, married, father of Adede Loguli and Lupai Loguli.

people.name: Poni Rejoice
people.info: Daughter of Murye Morris and Rebecca Kiden.

people.name: Bongo Julius
people.info: Son of Murye Morris and Rebecca Kiden, married twice, father of multiple children.

people.name: Oliva Losuba
people.info: Son of Murye Morris and Rebecca Kiden.

people.name: Rejoice Jaguru
people.info: First wife of Bongo Julius, mother of Adede Annet, Poni Jaguru, Emmanuel Wani, Evaline Juru, Yangi Sain, Kiden Patience.

people.name: Juan Adjumani
people.info: Second wife of Bongo Julius, mother of Kenyi Godwin, Lupai Surprise, Wani Bongo, Adede Julius, Poni Bongo.

people.name: Arusu Loguli
people.info: Wife of Joseph Loguli, mother of Adede Loguli and Lupai Loguli.

generations.title: Fourth Generation (Children of Bongo Julius & Rejoice Jaguru)

people.name: Adede Annet
people.info: Daughter of Bongo Julius and Rejoice Jaguru. Mother of Moses Pitia, Jason Sakor, and Peggy Konga.

people.name: Poni Jaguru
people.info: Daughter of Bongo Julius and Rejoice Jaguru. Deceased.

people.name: Emmanuel Wani
people.info: Son of Bongo Julius and Rejoice Jaguru. Alive.

people.name: Evaline Juru
people.info: Daughter of Bongo Julius and Rejoice Jaguru. Alive.

people.name: Yangi Sain
people.info: Son of Bongo Julius and Rejoice Jaguru. Deceased.

people.name: Kiden Patience
people.info: Son of Bongo Julius and Rejoice Jaguru. Alive.

people.info: Son of Bongo Julius and Juan Adjumani. Alive. Single.

people.name: Adede Loguli
people.info: Daughter of Joseph Loguli and Arusu Loguli. Single.

people.name: Lupai Loguli
people.info: Son of Joseph Loguli and Arusu Loguli. Single.
